task.title: Configuring queue manager connections by using the
task.shortdesc: System administrators and messaging administrators can configure queue manager connections by using the MQ Connectivity page in the .

context.p: You can configure a queue manager connection by using the , or by using the REST Administration APIs. For more information about using REST Administration APIs to configure queue manager connections, see .
For more information about the components that you must specify when you configure a queue manager connection, see .

note.p: To change the visibility of the data that is shown in a table, enter a value into Filter. The filter is applied to all of the pages in the table. You can filter on columns that contain icons by entering the value that is shown in the icon hover help into the Filter field. To clear the filter, click Clear Filter.

step.cmd: Go to the MQ Connectivity page in one of the following ways:

choices.choice: From the Home tab, click MQ Connectivity in the Configure IBM Watson IoT Platform - Message Gateway to accept connections pane.
From the Messaging menu, click MQ Connectivity

step.cmd: From the Queue Manager Connection Properties pane, choose an action:

choices.choice: To add a queue manager connection, click the Add icon.

To delete a queue manager connection, select the queue manager connection and click the Delete icon.
You can delete a queue manager connection only if all the destination mapping rules that were using the queue manager connection are deleted.

To edit a queue manager connection, select the queue manager connection and click the Edit icon.
You can edit a queue manager connection only if all the destination mapping rules that are using the queue manager connection are disabled.
